main event: A series of UFO sightings were reported near Saipan Island, including various detailed observations of unidentified flying objects.
interesting points: One witness reported a bright red, softball-sized object that moved slowly before rapidly disappearing., A flight crew from the US Navy observed an elongated cigar-shaped object estimated to be about 200 feet long., An additional report described a cylindrical object moving at high speed with no noise or visible propulsion., A sighting recorded by a Technical Sergeant in the U.S. Air Force noted an elongated cylindrical object traveling low over water at over 600 knots., Witnesses reported several instances of unusual objects that did not resemble typical aircraft or known phenomena.
sighted object: various unidentified flying objects described as spherical, elongated, or cigar-shaped
location: Saipan Island, Northern Mariana Islands, US
witness description: flight crew of the US Navy and a Technical Sergeant from the U.S. Air Force
